column4: I have a question.... I recently had a soundcard problem. After hours of googling, i found the solution was to build a custom kernel leaving atiixp-modem uninstalled.  So, I compiled the kernel and tried to boot from it... But it said that I had an error (something along the lines of cannot boot from unknown block) Help!!!??

I have a question.... I recently had a soundcard problem. After hours of googling, i found the solution was to build a custom kernel leaving atiixp-modem uninstalled.  So, I compiled the kernel and tried to boot from it... But it said that I had an error (something along the lines of cannot boot from unknown block) Help!!!??
take a look at /etc/hotplug/blacklist.d/alsa-base, that may fix your problem
the file I pointed you to should disable that modem module for you
